openwave.coreÔÉÅ

Core modules for OpenWave Energy Wave Theory simulations.

This package contains the fundamental components: - config: Configuration settings - constants: EWT and classical physics constants - equations: Core EWT equations and calculations

Modules

config

Configuration settings for the OpenWave project.

constants

Energy Wave Theory (EWT) constants module.

equations

Energy Wave Theory (EWT) equations module.
